Name: Melordandek
About the game: The game itself: Melordandek is a puzzle game. Its main concept is to find a path to walk on every tiles inside a map, and to walk on them only a single time. Each chapter brings two new tiles with a specific behaviour in order to make the game more and more intense. It contains: - 345 levels splitted into 10 chapters - A slowly increasing difficulty - easy levels and very hard levels - An intermittent scenario throughout the game - A black futuristic universe - soften for the game The story: In a universe where world's population is mostly made of robots called replicas, the White Union and the maverick hordes are accustomed to fight eachother physically but also throught computer viruses. Mavericks's speciality is turning replicas into maverick... but a long time ago, efficient protection were found by the White Union. The black horde - your former horde - was humiliated and splitted after the eradication of its central organization years ago... but now it is time to revenge. If replicas are out of scope, their military infrastructures are not, your new horde have sent you to infiltrate Zerotalis, white union's capital city, to infect their strategic processor... but on your way, you made a discovery... An erotic bot, officially designed with primitive technology but that appeired to be in reality made with replica's technology and twisted to have a specific mindset... built without any of the mandatory defenses against the maverick virus. An unexpected discovery that paves the way for the creation of a secret army evolving freely inside the city as they are absolutely everywhere... The first one you meet turns out to be a very powerful ally. As you work with her to achieve your mission, she works with you to break the chains she was born with.
